column4: hey how can i change it so that I dont get this message when I click a link from here. Failed to execute child process "/usr/bin/chromium-browser" (No such file or directory)
I have uninstalled chromium and wish to firefox instead
you've deleted a file it needs, re-install chromium
I dont wanna use chromium, i wish to have it set firefox, firefox is default browser but it still isnt recognizing it in here
